#summary Principles guiding the development of Bo2.

== Principles for maintainable software ==
  * [ArchitectureCentricDevelopmentProcess Architecture-centric development process]
  * [Bo2Layers Layered architecture]
    * Data access
    * Entity model
    * Business logic
    * User interface
  * [ProgramToInterfaces Program to interfaces]
  * [InterfacePerStereotype Map an interface to each stereotype class]
  * The business layer must be agnostic of the implementation details
  * Keep the system open to yet unknown technologies
  * [MinimizeCode Minimize the size of code]
     * Move utilities to separate 
     * Eliminate boilerplate code
  * [WriteOnceRunAnywhere Write Once Run Anywhere]
